title: 1bed/1bath.  Reserved Parking.  One Month Free! Call now!
posting_body: Picture coming home every day to the warm embrace of meticulous landscaping, comfortable homes, and thoughtful amenities tailored to enhance your life.

Located in Warner Center, Woodland Hills, with easy access to De Soto Blvd and Victory Blvd, Carillon Apartment Homes is just minutes away from Pierce College, as well as all the shopping, dining, and entertainment that nearby Los Angeles has to offer.

Sleek black kitchen appliances including gas range and built-in microwave-Warm cherry cabinetry with brushed nickel hardware-Open concept inviting living spaces-Black granite-look kitchen countertops                                                                                        Featured amenity-Oversized walk-in closets with storage-Convenient in-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity

Package locker with 24/7 access to packages                                                                                         Featured amenity-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements-Large dog run space with walking trail and grassy areas-Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating and water feature-Business center with PC workstations, printer, copier and Wi-Fi access-Easy access to the 101 Freeway, Warner Center Transit Station and Metro Orange Line                                                                                         Featured amenity-24-hour fitness center with free weights and cardio machines                                                                                         Featured amenity-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:

Only a small one-time payment-Relaxing pool featuring open air cabanas, lounge seating, spa and BBQ grills                                                                                         Featured amenity-Complimentary gated guest parking
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
